attributes.action: control the population of the UK in such a manner as to stop the forecast increase of the population to 71.6m by 2033.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The population of the UK should not be allowed to grow in the current uncontrolled manner. The quality of life of everyone who currently lives in the UK depends on this. How is the country's infrastructure supposed to cope with the ONS forecast of a  population 71.6m by 2033? What about transport, schools, hospitals for every single resident of the country. We deserve the best and a population of 70m is going to reduce everyone's quality of life.
